# BioAnalyst

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/kbajdzienko/mn.crd.app.svg?token=EXLmQ5prppsE3ZXzWHeJ&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/kbajdzienko/mn.crd.app)
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mn.crd.app is to provide a semi-automation tool for evaluation of the health parameters from hospital database and 
automated .docx report creation.

[Copyright Metanotitia, 2020](/LICENSE.md)

## Installation


You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval=FALSE}
 install.packages("devtools")
 devtools::install_github("w4356y/BioAnalyst")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to run current development version of the app:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(BioAnalyst)
 
# Run the application
runApp()
```
